designs.name: Swift Strike Corvette
designs.author: SpaceEngineer42
designs.description: A fast attack corvette designed for hit-and-run tactics. Features advanced propulsion systems and lightweight armor for maximum speed.

designs.name: Deep Explorer
designs.author: VoidWanderer
designs.description: A long-range exploration corvette equipped with advanced sensors and extended fuel capacity. Perfect for deep space missions.

designs.name: Cargo Runner
designs.author: TraderJoe
designs.description: An efficient transport corvette optimized for cargo capacity while maintaining decent speed and maneuverability.
